useAwaitThenable.description:
Description

Enforce thatawaitisonlyused onPromisevalues.
CautionAt the moment, this rule only checks for instances of the globalPromiseclass. This is a major shortcoming compared to the ESLint
rule if you are using customPromise-like implementations such asBluebirdor in-house solutions.
useAwaitThenable.option: This rule has no specific options.
